RTLB.ConfigureCompendiumSourcesDescription: Only the compendium sources selected below will be used when LogisticsBoy generates its equipment rollable tables.
RTLB.SelectCompendiumPacksUsed: Select the compendium packs used as equipment sources when generating rollable tables
RTLB.EquipmentCompendiumNotInitialized: equipment compendium does not appear to be initialized

CreatingTables.Title: Creating Tables
CreatingTables.Detail1: LogisticsBoy will create a default set of rollable tables full of loot items for use with StockBoy/LootBoy.
CreatingTables.Detail2: The tables will be added to the LogisticsBoy folder in the Rollable Tables tab.
CreatingTables.Detail3: Re-running Module will RESET any existing Module rollable tables!
CreatingTables.Detail4: Only the tables checked below will be created/affected.
CreatingTables.Detail5: Click the Create Rollable Tables button below when you are ready to proceed.
